cab.content: SECRET.OPERATIONSGeneral Plumer.C.I.G.S. Handed in 1.10 p,m. 8.1,18Received 1 a.m. 9.1.18.Snow fell yesterday in considerable quantities; if it continues it will prevent any large operations in the mountains. It appears that the projected enemy offensive on the lower Piave has been suspended for the present and there are no indications of any preparations for an offensive on a large scale between the Piave and the Astioo-, though local attacks are probable if the weather permits.From: -To:-0.178.
